summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1301, for the improvement of the alley in block 17, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between 5th avenue and 6th Avenue, from Pike Street to Union Street, by grading and paving the same, under Ordinance No. 14241 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
